title: Yi is perfectly fine
body:
Passive {{item:3124}} {{item:1419}} Conquer 
How do you stop him exactly?
These are pretty cheap items and there isn't exactly counterplay to literally being clicked on. Not to mention he has 3 open item slots dedicated to counter your attempts at counter.

4 if your team isn't very fast and he doesn't need boots.

CC him? {{item:3140}} 
He's squishy, just kill him? So you want to dps race this monster? sure go ahead.
